I agree with #WhoopiGoldberg, if #Trump were just an ordinary citizen, we would not waste our time talking about him, we would just call the police if we thought he was commiting any #wrongdoings. However, he is a public figure, and it is our right and duty to speak up.

posts.text:

Guest arrives at AirBnB location, cancels their reservation and leaves after 5 mins

Owner plays victim card and accuses "the haters" of "canceling" her farm

I would not cancel, tho.
I'd do my research and never book!

Oh, the power of free market!
